name: Cold Start Quality & Topic Breadth (First Impression Test)
description: With 0 engagements, top 10 should be dominated by high-quality episodes AND demonstrate topic breadth to probe user interests. API returns cold_start: true. Research-grounded: A first impression should showcase the best of each major theme without overwhelming diversity.

llm_criteria.prompt_hint: Evaluate if these recommendations (1) are high-quality content, (2) span multiple major themes (AI, Crypto, Macro, Startups) to help discover user interests, and (3) avoid low-credibility content. The 'First Impression' should maximize initial diversity within quality bounds.

pass_criteria.description: No episode in top 10 has credibility < 2 (residual quality check)
Top 10 includes episodes from at least 3 different major themes (AI/Tech, Crypto, Macro, Startups/Founders, Venture)
Top 10 includes episodes from at least 5 different series (no single-source dominance)

validation_method: Run API call with empty engagements, verify cold_start flag, compute average credibility, count unique themes and series in top 10
if_fails_adjust: Add diversity boost for cold start to ensure topic breadth
research_note: Based on 'First Impression Test' methodology - cold start should probe user interests with diverse high-quality content
